question: Which union ministry has launched Bharatiya Poshan Krishi Kosh (BPKK)?
option1: Ministry of Women and Child Development
answer: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation: The Bharatiya Poshan Krishi Kosh (BPKK) has been launched by Union Ministry of Women and Child Development (WCD) in partnership with Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation in New Delhi. The BPKK is a repository of diverse crops across 128 agro-climatic zones in India for better nutritional outcomes.
